Articles.Content:
Hi,

I've got some issues with my career i've started yesterday.

I've quitted the game but now when i save my career, i can't do anything.

For example, if i go to reaserch and development building and i click on the door icon to go back to the kerbal space center, i've got the icons of the kerbal space centers on the screen (the door icon on the bottom right, the contracts on the upper right) but the reaserch and development interface is still there so i can't go to an other building or else.

When clicking on the bottom right door icon, it shows the menu but i can't go back to the main page to chose another load game or start a new one.

I'm sorry for my bad english and i hope someone can help me getting through this.
